data.text: Ikiavɨra Itir God, kamaghɨn mɨgɨa ghaze,
Kɨ osɨmtɨzim inigh izɨtɨ a nɨ bativam.
Kɨ nɨn apaniba inigh izɨtɨ,
Eghtɨ nɨ bar moghɨra degeghirɨghtɨ, nguazim nɨ avaragham.
Ezɨ apanir iza nɨ mɨsozir kaba,
Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn Gavgaviba Bar Itim otoghɨva,
Eghtɨ kantrin igharazibar mɨdorozir gumazir avɨrir Ariel ko mɨsogha paza a gamiziba,
Ezɨ kantrin avɨribar mɨdorozir gumazir avɨrir kaba, Saionɨn Mɨghsɨam ko mɨsoghasa ize,
Ia Juda ko Jerusalemɨn gumazamiziba, ia okam nɨghnɨgh onganighvɨra ikɨ
Ikiavɨra Itir God ian damazibagh amizɨ pariam puv ian azi.

Kamaghɨn amizɨ, God irebamɨn mɨn garir bizimɨn aven nɨn akakaghamin biziba, nɨ dar mɨngaribagh foghan kogham. Mati me akaba aven itir akɨnafarim righa, kendelɨn gris a gatɨgha, pamtemɨn a dukuazɨ a gavgavizɨ, me a dɨponasa nɨ ganɨngi. Egh nɨ ti gumazir akɨnafariba dɨbora fozitam, akar akɨnafarimɨn itir kaba dɨponsɨ a mɨkɨmtɨ, a suam, “Akɨnafarir bar dukuagha gavgavizir kam, kɨ a dɨponan iburaghburaki.”
Eghtɨ nɨ ti gumazir akɨnafariba dɨbora fozir puvatɨzitam, akɨnafarimɨn itir akar osiziriba dɨponsɨ a mɨkɨmtɨ, a kamaghɨn mɨkɨmam, “Kɨ akɨnafariba dɨbora fozir puvatɨ.”
Ezɨ Ekiam kamaghɨn mɨgɨa ghaze:
Kamaghɨn amizɨ, kɨ uamategh bizir bar igharagha garitabar amutɨ,
Gumazamizir uan nɨghnɨzir kuraba ko uan arazir kuraba Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn da mongasava amiba, mevzika!
Me biziba otavkɨra bar da adafi.
Kɨran oveghangɨn biziba bar igharagh otivigham.
Eghtɨ dughiar kamɨn kuarir orazir puvatɨziba,
Eghtɨ gumazamizir uari abɨriba,
Eghtɨ gumazir ekiar kuraba, men gavgaviba gɨvagham.
Egh arazir kamra uaghan, gumazir pura ifara igharaz darazi isa kot garɨziba,
Kamaghɨn amizɨ, Ikiavɨra Itir God, kar Godɨn fomɨra Abrahamɨn akurazim, a datɨrɨghɨn kamaghɨn Israelian gumazamizibav gei:
Ia ingangarir kɨ ian tongɨn amizibar gan,
Eghtɨ gumazamizir nɨghnɨzir aghuiba itir puvatɨziba,
